Order Views¶

apps.order.views.admin_order_pdf(request, order_id)¶
Action for the superuser

Params:

-order_id:[String] A unique id of the order

Return:

-response: The generated PDF file about the order via request to the front-end

apps.order.views.render_to_pdf(template_src, context_dict={})¶

Parses the order to pdf for the customers Params:

-template_src: [String] Destination path

-context_dict: [Dictionary] Order’s information

ClickAway
